attributes.action: bring about the creation of memorial stamps for our war dead who served in Iraq  / Afganistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Royal Mail is issuing commemorative stamps showing British military uniforms over the years. It would be very appropriate to issue stamps to commemorate those who have lost their lives in the current conflicts in Iraq and Afghanistan (and perhaps other current theatres too)
